headline: Exclusive: Why the $18T retirement industry now sees blockchain as key to survival
summary: Investing.com--One of the most conservative corners of global finance, overseeing roughly $18 trillion in U.S. retirement assets, is confronting an unavoidable reality: its infrastructure is obsolete, and blockchain is no longer a future experiment. It is becoming a prerequisite for survival as non-traditional competitors move into long-term savings.
